hero.name: Matheus
hero.description: I am a full-stack developer and I work on building modern web applications, focusing on architecture, organization, and well structured solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I work as a full-stack developer focused on designing and developing complete digital solutions that are scalable, reliable, and well structured. My experience spans across the entire development process, allowing me to transform ideas into functional and efficient web applications. On the front end, I build interfaces that combine performance, usability, and visual consistency, always prioritizing a clean user experience and thoughtful design.
about.paragraph2: On the back end, I develop robust APIs and systems with attention to architecture, data integrity, and long term maintainability. I actively contribute to product evolution by optimizing workflows, improving system quality, and ensuring technical consistency throughout each stage of development. I also have a strong interest in application security, following best practices related to authentication, access control, API protection, and secure system design.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: A collection of projects showcasing my skills in full-stack development, from concept to deployment.

beautyFlowApi.title: BeautyFlow API
beautyFlowApi.description: BeautyFlow API is a REST API for beauty salons with modules for clients, services, scheduling, and role-based authentication. The project: applies strong validations, domain-oriented organization, and backend patterns focused on stability, security, and sustainable growth for real service operations at scale.

snap2pdf.title: Snap2PDF
snap2pdf.description: Snap2PDF is a web application focused on converting images into PDF files through a direct upload, ordering, and export flow. The project prioritizes speed, a clean interface, and consistent document generation for daily use cases, serving study, work and sharing routines with minimal friction across devices.

asyncTaskManager.title: Asynctask Manager
asyncTaskManager.description: Asynctask Manager is a system for asynchronous job processing with queues, workers, retries and monitoring. The architecture is designed for high concurrency, fault tolerance, and predictable execution, enabling teams to run background workflows safely and scale processing capacity in production environments.

simpleCRM.title: SimpleCRM
simpleCRM.description: SimpleCRM is a platform for freelancers and teams to manage clients, contacts, tasks, and pipeline stages in one workspace. The project: combines an objective interface with clear business rules, complete interaction history, and a scalable structure that evolves without losing performance or maintainability.

orderFlow.title: OrderFlow
orderFlow.description: OrderFlow API is a B2B backend for customer and order management with explicit business rules, reliable persistence, and layered architecture. The solution separates domain, application, and infrastructure concerns to improve maintainability, integration with external systems and safe evolution in production.

saldofy.title: Saldofy
saldofy.description: Saldofy is a web application for tracking income, expenses, goals, and categories across personal and business flows. The system delivers consolidated cash visibility, periodic reports and indicators to support faster decisions, with intuitive navigation and a foundation built for long-term product evolution.
